WestCoast Products

Plain Tubing

Aluminum tubing is one of the base components of our favorite style of robot construction. Tubing tends to be stronger and stiffer than plate construction due to its shape while still being lightweight because of its hollow profile. We offer: ...

Price: USD 7.99

Use a boxtube of any size to align two modules off of each other, and then read the offsets.
